title: Pediatrician - Northwest Pediatrics

description: A Pediatrician is a physician who specializes in the care of infants, children, adolescents, and young adults...
cleaned_text: Pediatric A Pediatrician is a physician who specializes in the care of infants, children, adolescents, and young adults. A pediatrician holds a Doctorate in Medicine from an accredited school of allopathic or osteopathic medicine and has successfully a 1 health Pediatric Center...
